metadata.name: TEA PARTY - Z. Serebriakova
metadata.description:
Z. Serebriakova
Cardboard, pastel
Original size 65x82 cm

Zinaida Serebriakova is one of the greatest female artists of the 20th century who has entered art history. 

By the age of 25, her striking talent as a monumental artist was revealed, and she became world-famous. Nowadays, Z. Serebriakova's works are highly valued all over the world. Her art impresses both: critics and passionate art lovers. 

In “Tea party”, the artist showed two half-naked girls hiding from the heat, quenching their thirst with tea. It was an era when women could only have a small tea break to escape from their busy days, enjoying a company of each other, taking a rest from reality.

(1932, private collection)



The original texture of the painting was kept so you can fully enjoy this historical masterpiece. 

NFT ONLY
